March 3, 1961
See Distribution
Gerald F. Winfield, O/CM 814-SA1
Draft of Televisibn Policy Paper
Attached is the draft of a paper backgrounding
and setting forth policy guidelines for ICA use in conÂ¬
sidering assistance for the development of television
facilities.
This study was undertaken and is submitted for
your comment pursuant to instructions from Dr. FitzGerald.
O/CM would appreciate your comments and suggestions
within two weeks following your receipt of the paper.
